column1: orne is a noun meaning "Trees" in Quenya
column3: slender tree such as an ashes or birches. Compare with orn in Sindarin.

column1: Helge Fauskanger has suggested that the form ornÃ« (retaining the same meaning) could be valid Neo-Quenya.Helge Fauskanger
